creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: young person seated on ground in LRC; three donkeys at left under an overhang--two standing, one wearing feed bag, one lying down--all with bundles on their backs; bearded figures with turbans in background in URQ
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

bottom center below image, printed in black: [Decamps Sculp]; URC above image, printed in black: [12]; LRC below sheet on mount, in pencil: [2]
markings: below image center, impressed in paper: illegible stamp; LLC, in black and red: two monogram stamps
title: Orientalist Scene
